channel.title: New boots pi! please help
channel.description: hey i just added ragefire, glavien, and steadfest boots to my rsps, i've added customs b4 no problem, u can see them in ur invy, and when u drop, but when u wear them u dont see them at all, then if ur wearing them and take off ur other arm it looks like u still have ur armour on until u take the boots off then it comes off, ive never seen this b4... can some1 please help me fix?

item.title: New boots pi! please help
item.dc:creator: @Gravity_pk Gravity pk
item.description:
@Gravity_pk wrote:

hey i just added ragefire, glavien, and steadfest boots to my rsps, i’ve added customs b4 no problem, u can see them in ur invy, and when u drop, but when u wear them u dont see them at all, then if ur wearing them and take off ur other arm it looks like u still have ur armour on until u take the boots off then it comes off, ive never seen this b4… can some1 please help me fix?
